data.title: Air line, driving route, midpoint
data.meta_description: Shows the distance in kilometres between Szeged and Zemun and displays the route on an interactive map. Worldwide distance calculator with air line, route planner, travel duration and flight distances.
data.text:
Distance: 98.15 mi (157.96 km)

The shortest distance (air line) between Szeged and Zemun is 98.15 mi (157.96 km).

Driving route: -- ( - )

The shortest route between Szeged and Zemun is according to the route planner. The driving time is approx. . Half of the trip is reached in .

Bearing: 172.51° (S)

The initial bearing on the course from Szeged to Zemun is 172.51° and the compass direction is S.

Midpoint: 45.54959,20.27977

The geographic midpoint between Szeged and Zemun is in 49.08 mi (78.98 km) distance between both points in a bearing of 172.51°. It is located in Serbia, Vojvodina, Central Banat District (Србија, Војводина, Средњебанатски округ).

Time difference: 0h

Szeged and Zemun are both in the same time zone Europe/Budapest.
